property.name: Effect
property.value: When Summoned: add a Cloud Beast monster from your deck or graveyard to your hand. (-2 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: When Summoned: add a Cloud Beast or Cloud Herder monster from your deck or graveyard to your hand. (-4 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: Instead of being banished, all Cloud Beast monsters are sent to the graveyard instead(-2 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: When Summoned: Special Summon 1 Wind-Mage-Cloud Herder minion with 0 attack and 20 defense. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: You gain an additional normal summon for Wind-Mages only (-3 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: If a Wind Monster is removed from the field add a monster with 0 defense from your deck or graveyard to your hand (-3 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: When summoned target a wind monster. That monster can attack twice this turn. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (-10 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand, it cannot be normal summoned. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. If this monster attacked on your turn, banish it when you end your turn.

property.name: Effect
property.value: (-2 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand, it cannot be normal summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. If this monster attacked on your turn, banish it when you end your turn. Passive: When this card inflicts battle damage draw 2 cards. (-1 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (-2 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand, it cannot be normal summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. If this monster attacked on your turn, banish it when you end your turn. If this card is banished draw 1 card. If this card is destroyed draw 2 cards. (-1 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (-3 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand, it cannot be normal summoned. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. If this monster attacked on your turn, banish it when you end your turn. Passive: This card can attack twice (-1 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (-8 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. If this monster attacked on your turn, banish it when you end your turn. When Summoned: choose one wind-beast monster on your side of the field. It cannot be banished this turn. (-1 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (-8 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. If this monster attacked on your turn, banish it when you end your turn. When this card inflicts battle damage Draw 5 cards. If this resets your deck, you don't pay. (-1 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: All Wind-Beasts deal piercing damage. +5 Gold per turn

property.name: Effect
property.value: During this turn, if a Wind Monster on your field would be banished, return it to your hand instead. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Pay Half your LP. Receive +10 Gold. This effect can only be activated once per turn.

property.name: Effect
property.value: In 3 turns receive +15 Gold. This effect can only be activated once every 3 turns. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: You can only use this effect once during this turn. When a card asks you to pay gold this turn, it's cost becomes zero. Next turn pay double its original cost.

property.name: Effect
property.value: For this turn only any effect that has a gold cost for wind monsters is reduced by 2. (-10 Life Points Per Use)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Banish a Wind monster on your side of the field. Destroy one monster your opponent controls. (-4 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: All Wind-Mages summoned this turn gain an additional 20 defense, but they now have Weak Shield: Reduce the defense of this monster's defense equal to the attacking monster's attack. This effect can only be activated once per turn. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Wind Monster + Wind Monster) When summoned deal 10 damage to your opponent's life points (-2 Gold).

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Cloud Herder monster + Cloud Herder monster) When Summoned: Draw 1 card for every card of yours that has been banished. If this would trigger a deck reset, pay half the cost. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Cloud Herder monster + Cloud Herder monster) When Summoned: if there's a cloud beast on your side of the field add up to 2 spell cards from your deck to your hand or choose to gain 5 Gold. (-10 Life Points)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Cloud Beast monster + Cloud Beast monster) (-5 Gold) This card can special summon itself from your hand but cannot be normal summoned. Cannot attack the turn it's summoned. Cannot attack unless there's a cloud beast on your side of the field. If this card attacks on your turn, it's banished at the end of your turn. Passive: For every monster of yours that's been banished, increase the attack of all Wind monsters by 5. (-1 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Wind Monster + Beast Monster) This card is unnafected by card effects. As long as this card remains on the field, opponents may only target this monster for an attack. Weak Shield: Opponents can attack and reduce the defense of this card equal to the attacking monster's attack. When summoned: disable one effect on the field except this card. (-4 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Temporarily Increase the attack of all Beast monsters on your side of the field by 5, only on your turn. On your opponent’s turn, all Dark monsters on your side of the field cost 2 less life points to activate their effects. +3 Gold per turn

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: If this card is removed from the field, your opponent pays you 10 gold. (-10LP) Transform: This monster transforms into a Light-Beast on your turn and loses its passive. While this monster is a Light-Beast monster, this monster’s attack is temporarily increased by 18. When your turn is over, this monster is transformed back into its original state.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: If this card is removed from the field, Special Summon one “Cursed” monster from your graveyard. (-10LP) Transform: This monster transforms into a Light-Beast on your turn and loses its passive. While this monster is a Light-Beast monster, this monster’s attack is temporarily increased by 15. When your turn is over, this monster is transformed back into its original state.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: If this card is removed from the field, your opponent cannot make an attack for 1 turn. (-10LP) Transform: This monster transforms into a Light-Beast on your turn and loses its passive. While this monster is a Light-Beast monster, this monster’s attack is temporarily increased by 15. When your turn is over, this monster is transformed back into its original state.

property.name: Effect

When your turn is over, this monster is transformed back into its original state.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: If this card would be removed from the field, add this card to your hand instead (-20LP) Transform: This monster transforms into a Light-Beast on your turn and loses its passive. While this monster is a Light-Beast monster, this monster’s attack is temporarily increased by 20. When your turn is over, this monster is transformed back into its original state.

property.name: Effect
property.value: When Summoned: Duplicate this card and Special Summon it, but it has no effect. You can only activate this effect if this monster’s attack is higher than its original attack when it’s summoned. (-8 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: When Summoned: Reduce the attack of one monster on your opponent’s side of the field by 10 temporarily for this turn. You can only activate this effect if this monster’s attack is higher than its original attack. (-8 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: When this monster battles another monster, destroy that monster regardless of the outcome. (-10 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: When Summoned: Banish 1 “beast” monster on your side of the field and in 3 turns, Special Summon 2 copies of it. (-30LP in 3 Turns)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive: If this card is removed from the field gain +3 Gold (-5LP)

property.name: Effect
property.value: The Gold cost for “Beast” monsters on your side of the field are reduced by 5 this turn. (-10LP)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Select 1 “Beast” monster on your side of the field. It can attack twice this turn. (-10 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: If you opponent attempts to attack a “Dark-Warrior” monster; switch it into defense mode if it isn’t already and give that monster 20 defense for the remainder of this battle phase. (-7 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Return one “Dark-Warrior” monster on your side of the field to your hand. (-7 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Banish 2 monsters from your hand, then Banish 1 card on the field. (-10 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: If you would summon a “Beast” monster this turn that requires tributes, it would cost 1 less tribute. (-6 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: Equip this to a “Beast” monster only. Whenever this monster destroys another monster by combat, gain +4 Gold. (-6LP) If this card would be removed from the field, return it to the hand instead. (-10LP)

property.name: Effect
property.value: If your opponent targets a “Dark-Warrior” monster for an attack; Banish it and special summon a “transformed” monster from your hand. If that monster can only be transformed during your turn, ignore it for this battle phase only. (-5 Gold)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Banish 2 Light-Beasts from your Graveyard) Passive: If this card is removed from the field, Banish 1 card from on the field. (-10LP) Transform: This monster transforms into a Light-Beast on your turn and loses its passive. While this monster is a Light-Beast monster, this monster’s attack is temporarily increased by 10. When your turn is over, this monster is transformed back into its original state.

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Banish 4 Beast Monsters from your field) Passive: When this monster battles another monster, Banish that monster. (-20LP)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Banish 2 beast monsters from your field and hand)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Banish 1 beast monster from your field) Add 1 Spell Card from your deck to your hand (-10LP)

property.name: Effect
property.value: (Banish 5 Beast monsters from your deck) When Summoned: Special summon 3 “Demon-Beast” Minions whose attack and defense is 3 and 3.
